biotools.summary: Provides comprehensive prediction of microRNA target repression strength. MicroRNAs, or miRNAs, post-transcriptionally repress the expression of protein-coding genes. Our resource enables to search precompiled and predict online miRNA targets with miRmap.

bioschemas.name: miRmap
bioschemas.summary: Provides comprehensive prediction of microRNA target repression strength. MicroRNAs, or miRNAs, post-transcriptionally repress the expression of protein-coding genes. Our resource enables to search precompiled and predict online miRNA targets with miRmap.
